title: What is this Font ?
content:
Hello there

can anyone help me with the font in this picture ?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011073314im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Capture222_6151.JPG)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Capture222.JPG](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011073314/http:/typophile.com/files/Capture222.JPG) | 8.65 KB |
author: sirjason

comments.content:
posted to wrong board :( very sorry for that...

appreciate if a mod can move the topic

Thank you, sirjason, for noticing the "Type ID" forum (even if it's a bit too late).

Pending a moderator moving your post: this font _appears_ to be [ITC Eras Light](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011073314/http:/store1.adobe.com/cfusion/store/html/index.cfm?store=OLS-US&event=displayFontPackage&code=1053), except ... someone didn't like the exquisitely small slant (a feature of this font by design), and backslanted it upright?
thanks very much, really appreciated your assitance
